entry.title: PowerBI CALCULATE & FILTER & ALL & VALUES
entry.content: CALCULATEçš„ä¸­FILTERï¼ŒALLï¼ŒVALUESçš„ç»„åˆåº”ç”¨å¯æ€»ç»“å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š12345= CALCULATE(COUNTROWS('Demo'),FILTER( ALL('Demo'[Color]), 'Demo'[Color] = "Green" ) ) â€“ ignores/replaces existing Color filters and sets a filter on Green è¿™å°†å¿½ç•¥/æ›¿æ¢å·²å­˜åœ¨çš„é¢œè‰²ç­›é€‰å™¨å¹¶é‡æ–°è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªColorä¸ºGreençš„ç­›é€‰å™¨ã€‚ 12345= CALCULATE(COUNTROWS('Demo'),FILTER( VALUES('Demo'[Color]), 'Demo'[Color] = "Green" ) ) â€“ keeps existing Color filters and adds a further filter on Green è¿™å°†ä¿æŒå·²å­˜åœ¨çš„å¯¹Demo[Color]åˆ—çš„ç­›é€‰ï¼Œå¹¶å¯¹æ­¤åˆ—å¢žåŠ ä¸€ä¸ªColorä¸ºGreençš„ç­›é€‰å™¨ã€‚ 12345678= CALCULATE(COUNTROWS('Demo'),FILTER( ALL('Demo'[Color]), 'Demo'[Color] = "Green" ),VALUES('Demo'[Color]) ) â€“ same as the previous expression (keeps existing Color filters) â€“ NOTE: the first filter would consider all the colors, but the second â€“ expression (VALUES) only consider the current selection and â€“ the two filters will be considered using an AND condition, thus ä¸Žä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œ FILTER( ALL(â€˜Demoâ€™[Color]), â€˜Demoâ€™[Color] = â€œGreenâ€ )é‡ç½®äº†ä¸€ä¸ªColorä¸ºGreençš„ç­›é€‰å™¨ï¼ŒVALUES(â€˜Demoâ€™[Color])ä¿æŒäº†å·²æœ‰çš„ç­›é€‰å™¨ï¼Œæ•´ä¸ªç­›é€‰ç»“æžœæ˜¯è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªç­›é€‰å™¨çš„ç»¼åˆæ•ˆæžœï¼Œå³åŒæ—¶æ»¡è¶³ä¸¤å¤„ç­›é€‰çš„é‚£äº›è¡Œã€‚ 12345= CALCULATE(COUNTROWS('Demo'),FILTER( ALL('Demo'), 'Demo'[Color] = "Green" ) ) â€“ ignores/replaces filters on all Demo columns, â€“ and sets a filter on all columns (Name, Transport etc., not just Color) â€“ with rows that meet the condition æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯ï¼šALL(â€˜Demoâ€™)è€Œä¸æ˜¯ALL(â€˜Demoâ€™[Color])ï¼Œå³é‡ç½®å¯¹äºŽâ€™Demoâ€™çš„æ‰€æœ‰åˆ—ç­›é€‰å™¨ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­â€™Demoâ€™[Color] =â€Greenâ€ï¼Œå…¶ä»–åˆ—ä¸ºæ— ç­›é€‰å™¨ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µä¸‹é€‰æ‹©ç¬¦åˆç­›é€‰çš„æ‰€æœ‰è¡Œã€‚

äºŒã€MySQLåˆ é™¤å¤šåˆ—æ•°æ®é‡å¤é—®é¢˜ éœ€æ±‚ï¼šåˆ é™¤PURCHASE_ORDER_ID,STOCK_ORDER_ID,OWNER_IDå¤šä½™çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œä¿ç•™STOCK_BILL_IDæœ€å°çš„ä¸€æ¡ 1. å…ˆæŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºé‡å¤æ•°æ®1234æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºé‡å¤æ•°æ®ä¸­STOCK_BILL_IDæœ€å¤§çš„ SELECT MAX(STOCK_BILL_ID) FROM `GOODS_STOCK_BILLS` GROUP BY PURCHASE_ORDER_ID,STOCK_ORDER_ID,OWNER_ID HAVING(COUNT(1)>1); 2. åˆ é™¤æœ€å¤§çš„GOODS_PRICE_IDï¼Œä¿ç•™å°çš„ã€‚123456789DELETE FROM GOODS_STOCK_BILLS WHERE STOCK_BILL_ID IN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MAX(STOCK_BILL_ID) FROM `GOODS_STOCK_BILLS` GROUP BY PURCHASE_ORDER_ID,STOCK_ORDER_ID,OWNER_ID HAVING (COUNT(*) > 1) ) B ); 3. å°†ä¸€å¼ è¡¨é‡Œçš„æŸåˆ—å€¼æ›´æ–°åˆ°å¦å¤–ä¸€å¼ è¡¨çš„æŸåˆ—åŽ»onåŽé¢æ˜¯è¡Œæ•°æ®çš„å”¯ä¸€æ€§ï¼Œå¼€å§‹æˆ‘åªç”¨äº†g.OWNER_ID = d.OWNER_IDæŠ¥é”™äº†ï¼ŒåŽæ¥æŠŠg.GOODS_ID=d.GOODS_IDåŠ ä¸Šå°±å¥½äº† 12345UPDATE GOODS_STOCK AS gLEFT JOIN GOODS_STOCK_DETAIL AS d ON ( g.OWNER_ID = d.OWNER_ID AND g.GOODS_ID = d.GOODS_ID ) SET g.STOCK_AMOUNT = d.STOCK_COUNT WHEREg.OWNER_ID = 'a-6b4b6e70-b66d-4739-818b-ea9e6524113b'; ä¸‰ã€MySQLå°†Aè¡¨æŸå­—æ®µåˆ†ç»„æ±‚å’Œçš„æ•°æ®æ›´æ–°åˆ°Bè¡¨ä¸­å¦å¤–ä¸€å­—æ®µ123UPDATE GOODS_STOCK A INNER JOIN (SELECT GOODS_ID,OWNER_ID,SUM(STOCK_COUNT) AS STOCK_COUNT FROM GOODS_STOCK_DETAIL GROUP BY GOODS_ID,OWNER_ID) as B ON (A.GOODS_ID = B.GOODS_ID AND A.OWNER_ID = B.OWNER_ID) SET A.STOCK_AMOUNT = B.STOCK_COUNT
